content:
You can attach a few files for test decryption by packing them into an archive with zip, rar, tar, 7zip, 7z, tar.gz extensions of no more than 10 megabytes using the attach button directly in the chat.

If your archive weighs more than 10 megabytes, please use our file sharing service.
http://lockbitfss2w7co3ij6am6wox4xcurtgwukunx3yubcoe5cbxiqakxqd.onion
http://lockbitfsvf75glg226he5inkfgtuoakt4vgfhd7nfgghx5kwz5zo3ad.onion
http://lockbitfskq2fxclyfrop5yizyxpzu65w7pphsgthawcyb4gd27x62id.onion
For security reasons we do not click on other links you send in chat.
Please wait for a reply, sometimes it takes several hours due to possible time zone differences.
Hi
Anyone there?
no one?
I guess no one gonna answer here
Hi
hey
i would like to have a proof of the stolen data. So I know that u guys didn't just encrypt and also stole data from our network
it is gumustasmaden.com
cost of the decryption ?
hey is there any one for communication ?
http://temp.sh/hqjVo/tree_GUMUSTASMADEN.txt
4 btc
are u able to discount for us? as u know that we are not able to afford this amount.
If you are telling us the truth you already have our files, and if you can take a look at our files that you will know that price is BIG than our size
would u tell us reasonable price to pay
I want to hear your suggestions
we can pay maximum 0.5 BTC. is that possible for you?
4btc

Hello,

We have reviewed your request of 4 BTC, but unfortunately this is completely unrealistic for us.

We are a small company based in Turkey, and due to the current economic situation, including extreme inflation and currency devaluation, we are struggling to even cover basic operational costs. 4 BTC is equivalent to more than what our company earns in months, and it is simply not possible for us to gather such an amount.

After speaking with management and evaluating all our options, the absolute maximum we could possibly arrange is 1 BTC. Even this would require extraordinary effort and personal sacrifices from our team.

Please consider our situation. We are not a large or wealthy organization, and we are trying to recover and continue supporting our employees and customers. We hope you will be reasonable and work with us towards a solution.

Looking forward to your response.
I know your financial situation, you're bluffing, the price for you is 4 bitcoins. If you continue to be cunning, the price will be doubled to 8 Bitcoins.
